Text:
What you need for ripping your vinyls is GoldWave (I personally prefer v4 to v5), as once you have recorded your vinyl you can then manually add flags along the timeline & split the track at the flags.
If you want me to upload GoldWave 4.26 just let me know
No need for that, as I don't intend to rip records anymore. I don't have any other "rare" stuff. But thanx anyway!

Ah yes, here's a link for those willing to buy this album on a CD.

http://www.amazon.com/Warning-Stardust-Bow-Wow/dp/B00005A1FN
